abstract: Manfred Gerlach, East Germany's last head of state and the first politician outside the ruling Communist Party to hold that position, dies at age 83.
snippet: Mr. Gerlach was a politician known for his support of liberal reforms and criticism of the Communist Party.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Gerlach was a politician known for his support of liberal reforms and criticism of the Communist Party.

headline.main: Manfred Gerlach, East German Head of State, Dies at 83
headline.print_headline: Manfred Gerlach, 83, Backer Of Reforms in East Germany
headline.seo: Manfred Gerlach, East German Leader, Dies at 83
